text: khto ovolodiv znannyam z knyhy skazav, "ya mozhu prynesty tse do vas u blymayete vashoho oka." Koly vin pobachyv tse ulahodzhenyy pered yo, vin skazav, "Tse ye blahoslovennya z moho Lorda, tym samym Vin vyprobovuye meni, shchob pokazaty ya chy appreciative abo unappreciative. Whoever appreciative appreciative dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy, ta yakshcho kozhnyy povertaye unappreciative, todi miy Lord ye u ne treba dlya nʹoho, Naybilʹsh Pochesnyy
